title: Giovanni de Faccio
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Giovanni de Faccio**

Italian calligrapher and type designer living in [Austria](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Austria).

Designed [df Rialto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/df%20Rialto) together with [Lui Karner](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lui%20Karner). Other typefaces under way, among them [df Stilo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103359/http:/typophile.com/wiki/df%20Stilo).

No website presence yet.
author: k.l.
